text: wan sung brrda bıhna ca khaw phxng læa brrda bıhna ca da khla swn brrda phu thi bıhna khxng phwk khea da khla nan (phwk khea ca thuk tham wa) phwk cea di ptiseth sraththa hlangcak thi phwk cea sraththa læwk ra nan hrux? Phwk cea cng chim kar lngthosʹ theid neuxngcak kar thi phwk cea ptiseth sraththa
